name: Text Story Prompt Pack
description: A collection of text-based story prompts to inspire your creativity.
author: Your Name

prompts.title: The Mysterious Letter
prompts.prompt: You receive a letter in the mail with no return address. Inside, there's a cryptic message that leads you on an unexpected adventure. Describe your journey and the discoveries you make along the way.

prompts.title: A Day in the Life of a Time Traveler
prompts.prompt: Imagine you are a time traveler who can visit any era in history. Write about a day in your life as you navigate the challenges and wonders of a different time period.

prompts.title: The Forgotten Village
prompts.prompt: You stumble upon a hidden village that seems to have been forgotten by time. Describe the people, culture, and secrets of this mysterious place.

prompts.title: The Last Book on Earth
prompts.prompt: In a world where physical books have become extinct, you find the last remaining book. Write about its contents and the impact it has on society.

prompts.title: A Conversation with Your Future Self
prompts.prompt: You have the opportunity to speak with your future self. Write about the advice they give you and how it changes your perspective on life.
